ai-patthana24.8:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.8:0.3_0: covered over with gold, silver and money,
ai-patthana24.8:1.1_0: or only give rise to the defilements.
ai-patthana24.8:2.1_0: There are three kinds of known beginning with non-violence.
